name: EverQuest: Claws of Veeshan
summary: EverQuest: Claws of Veeshan is the twenty-seventh expansion pack to EverQuest. A continuation of the story from the previous expansion, Torment of Velious, the plot involves the player challenging the dragons and undead creatures who roam the frozen lands of Velious. It features six new zones along with new quests, raids, missions, and alternate advancement abilities for each class, as well as a new Dragon's Hoard offering additional storage space.
